full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RAB GNAS BKRA SHIS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'DZIN PA'I RLABS CHEN THUGS BSKYED KYI DAM BCA' GZHAN PHAN SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO BZANG DGE LEGS MCHOG NAS BKA' NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, SHA'KYA'I BTZUN PA BSKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN GYIS BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI RIN CHEN RGYA MTSAN RGYA MTSO'O, ,)
